lead_paragraph: Shares of two companies owned by the Chinese billionaire Pan Sutong fell sharply, in the second day of steep share price declines.

headline.print_headline: Goldin, a Highflying Hong Kong Stock, Tumbles
headline.main: Goldin, a Highflying Hong Kong Stock, Tumbles
